Room.Name: Level One Circular Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: This is the northeast corner of Prince Rutger's Tower Castle.
Room.LongDescription: This castle was built in the form of a great tower, and is made up of many circular levels. This ground level is the largest of the several levels. the door you see leads to the castle library. Farther to the southeast there is a side corridor leading towards the center courtyard.
